Pre-Game Insights: Guyana's Golden Jaguars are intensifying preparations for their crucial clash against Suriname in League A of the Concacaf Nations League on September 5.
The game will start at 16:00h at the National Track and Field Centre, West Coast Demerara.
Tickets cost G$2,000 and are available at the Guyana Football Federation’s office at Section ‘K’ Campbellville, Georgetown.
The Federation is encouraging fans to wear yellow in support of the Golden Jaguars.
On Tuesday, players and officials attended a press conference at the National Training Centre at Providence, sharing their thoughts on the game.
Others: The match will take place at the National Track & Field Centre, Leonora.
Tickets can also be purchased at the Venue on match day.
